subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Jason Spezza scored a power-play goal for his 300th N.H.L. point and Dany Heatley had two assists to reach 50 points this season, leading the host Ottawa Senators to a 5-2 victory against the Islanders on Thursday.
snippet: Jason Spezza scored a power-play goal for his 300th N.H.L. point and Dany Heatley had two assists to reach 50 points this season, leading the host Ottawa Senators to a 5-2 victory against the Islanders on Thursday.
